summary: Defines a comprehensive set of data models and abstract interfaces for language model‑driven conversational and retrieval systems, including message types, agent actions, memory handling, retrievers, parsers, and result containers.
business_intent: Establish a reusable schema that standardizes how components such as chat messages, documents, agents, and retrieval mechanisms are represented and interacted with, facilitating consistent development and evaluation of AI‑powered retrieval and dialogue pipelines.
